# Results 

## Tables

```{r h2_table, results = "asis"}

h2.xtab <- xtable::xtable(h2.tab,
  caption =
    "Genotypic effects of cottonwood trees on the associated lichen community.",
  label = "tab:h2_table"
)
print(h2.xtab,
  type = "latex",
  include.rownames = FALSE,
  include.colnames = TRUE
)

```
